entry.title: RT Thorne 🌸 ens0.eth: Wrote about the Great Yuga Gas Wars of last night and how they reflect poorly upon web3. We need responsible launches of high...
entry.summary: RT Thorne 🌸 ens0.eth Wrote about the Great Yuga Gas Wars of last night and how they reflect poorly upon web3. We need responsible launches of high-demand projects, L2s that don't become walled gardens, and, most of all, reliably low transaction fees for most people. https://smol.news/p/the-great-yuga-gas-wars
